Package domain.interfaces

Interface Summary
Action This abstract interface define the generic model for a Action in the game.
Actionable This abstract interface define the generic model that an Actionable instance will have.
Catchable  
Collisionable This interface defines the model that a collisionable game entity should have to get its collisions managed by the Collisions class.
Dropable  
FiredAction This is a subinterface of Action.
FiredActionable This subinterface inherits the Actionable methods.
Logic This interface is intended to make the game logic a bit faster to develop.
Movable Any game entity wich implements this interface will represent something wich is able to move around the Scenario.
Reactable This subinterface inherits the Actionable methods.
ReactedAction This is a subinterface of Action.
Talkable  
Useable
